Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2011 12:53AM Brenna-30yrsold-NYC wrote: sweetbean, Are you serious??!!! 20 years??? WOW! I had NO idea that was even possible. My oncologist has informed me that people with what i have only make it 2-3 years. So hear i am like planning my funeral at this point! I am so glad you told me that. and i am so happy i joined this site! :) Thanks ladies!

Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2011 03:17AM Brenna-30yrsold-NYC wrote: Does any of you ladies have any recommendations to how i should change the quality of my life? and or share stories of how you changed your lives around while living with this disease.... i want to become a stronger women for my 4 year old daughter Mikela, myself, and my loved ones.  LIke should i start juicing or going to church or whatever helped you. Thanks for all your stories. i wish i can give all you ladies out there big hugs. Brenna

Posts.Content: Aug 27, 2011 08:00PM Brenna-30yrsold-NYC wrote: Hello ladies! :) So nice meeting you all thru this site. I am SOO glad i joined it for sure! I needed this in my life right now. Thank you all for all your support and helpful advice and inspirational stories!! I am sorry we all have to be here :( but i think we all need eachother in one way or another and are destined to meet and talk here...... and i am happy to be a part of such a strong community of women! :) you all are wonderful and i admire everyone one of you. And Gigi, i will DEFINITELY look into that Gildas club for my 4 year old daughter!! thanks. Much love, Brenna

Posts.Title: 30yrs old Stage 4 Metastatic Breast Cancer and Bone Metastases Brenna-30yrsold-NYC Brenna-30yrsold-NYC

Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2011 04:33PM Brenna-30yrsold-NYC wrote: thank you ladies for your responses but i just dont get how most of my friends just left me at a time like this.. guess they were never a friend right? but all i need to feel from people now is a little bit of compassion.. not even sympathy. and it sucks that people are just that heartless. eve my own mother cant put herself in my shoes. i rely on all your stories and replies to keep my head up.. my daughter is my life and she needs her mommy and it saddens me everytime i think how im not going to be around for too much longer and shes only 4!!! OMG!! i am so freakin sad. i wish i wasnt sick. but i guess since im just newly diagnosed 6 months ago it will get easier. thank you ladies! B
Posts.Title: I HATE BREAST CANCER Brenna-30yrsold-NYC FireKracker

Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2011 03:21AM Brenna-30yrsold-NYC wrote: thank you so much for responding so fast. you just saved me from crying all over my keyboard! lol.. i just needed to vent. much love to you!! Brenna
Posts.Title: NEW TO CHEMO!! Brenna-30yrsold-NYC CoolBreeze

Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2011 05:08PM Brenna-30yrsold-NYC wrote: hi Jan, i totally feel your pain.. i was diagnosed straight off the bat with metastatic stage 4 bc too.. that was 6 months ago.. im 30 now.. mine has spread to the spine, bone marrow, pelvis.. i am more mad at the fact that people i thought would have been there for me arent and live a full healthy life. I just dont understand how inhumane people can be to not have a heart and at least sympathize a little. thats all i ask is a little bit of compassion. take care and good luck to everyone out there regardless of age!! we all are going thru this together! xoxo B
